byline.contributor: Matthew Rosenberg reported from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York. Michael S. Schmidt and Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and MAGGIE HABERMAN

abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump offers post of national security adviser to Lt Gen Michael T Flynn, who has history of making Islamophobic comments and believes Islamist militancy poses threat to America that is on par with world war.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The move could put a retired intelligence officer who believes Islamist militancy poses an existential threat in one of the most powerful roles in shaping military and foreign policy.
